channel.title: Log-out time
channel.description:
Not quite sure where this thread should go, so I put it here.
Anyway, is it possible to change how long it takes a player to log out if they haven't pressed anything or moved in-game? That may be hard to understand.
This isn't that important, but help would be appreciated.
Thanks. 14-08

item.title: Log-out time
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

Declare a variable for lastAction. Every time something’s done, lastAction = System.getCurrentTimeMillis(); Then, in process,

if(System.getCurrentTimeMillis() - lastAction == whatever) logout();

Read full topic
